verbs.description: [ARG0: audi] [V: recalls] [ARG1: 1 2 million vehicles coolant pumps can overheat] audi is recalling about 391 000 cars and suvs in the u s and canada because the electric coolant pumps can overeat and possibly cause a fire the recall covers the 2013 to 2016 a4 the 2013 to 2017 a5 the 2012 to 2015 a6 and the q5 suv from 2013 to 2017 audi
